overview.summary: Specifies the data type of a field, property, or FbParameter.

field.name: Array
field.summary: Array values. This maps to System.Array.

field.name: BigInt
field.summary: Exact numeric value (SQL_INT64). This maps to Int64.

field.name: Binary
field.summary: A stream of binary data (SQL_BLOB). This maps to an Array of type Byte.

field.name: Char
field.summary: A fixed-length character string (SQL_CHAR). This maps to String.

field.name: Date
field.summary: Date data (SQL_TYPE_DATE). This maps to DateTime.

field.name: Decimal
field.summary: Signed, exact, numeric value with a precision of at least p and scale s, The maximum precision is 18 (SQL_DECIMAL). This maps to Decimal.

field.name: Double
field.summary: Signed, approximate, numeric value with a binary precision 53 (SQL_DOUBLE). This maps to Double.

field.name: Float
field.summary: Signed, approximate, numeric value with a binary precision 24 (SQL_FLOAT). This maps to Single.

field.name: Guid
field.remarks: Guid's should be used only with CHAR(16) fields with the OCTETS character set.

field.name: Integer
field.summary: Exact numeric value with precision 10 and scale 0 (SQL_LONG). This maps to Int32.

field.name: Numeric
field.summary: Signed, exact, numeric value with a precision p and scale s (SQL_DECIMAL). This maps to Decimal.

field.name: SmallInt
field.summary: Exact numeric value with precision 5 and scale 0 (SQL_SHORT). This maps to Int16.

field.name: Text
field.summary: Variable length character data. Maximum length is data sourceâ€“dependent (SQL_TEXT). This maps to String.

field.name: Time
field.summary: Time data (SQL_TYPE_TIME). This maps to DateTime.

field.name: TimeStamp
field.summary: Date data (SQL_TIMESTAMP). This maps to DateTime.

field.name: VarChar
field.summary: A variable-length character string (SQL_TEXT). This maps to String.
